title: The Besties Podcast XVII
description: In this time and political and Today Show-centric turmoil, it's comforting to know your friends The Besties are constant. Some iOS game you've never heard of? Check. Russ Frushtick doing a terrible European accent. You betcha. Come, bask in our stability.
author: thebestiesbizemail@gmail.com (The Besties)
